name.description: this scene's name, it's important as it can be used to link it from a parent assets file, required if uri is not present

backgroundColor.description: the color of the background when no skybox is selected

skybox.description: an object containing an index to the texture and the sampler, sampler is optional

texture.description: an index into the textures list, can point to a cubemap or an equirectangular texture

sampler.description: an index into the samplers list

camera.description: the name of the entity with a camera component this scene will be seen through

entities.description: a list of index to query from the entities list to add to this scene's root entity children
